name: Aerico
description: Umbras specialist ship.  It spreads the Umbra Blight plague through its spawned ships and draws energy from Blight Nebula Fields.
obtaining: You can obtain its blueprint by attacking Umbra Overlord Cargo in Umbra sector.
tips-builds: Use Nova missiles, Eclipse or Glance cannon use what ever you want.. Ablative armor, Magnetic Collar and Harmonic Thrusters. I recommend using blight myr..
author: Useless Sonanochi
